Project.Brief history of your project and organi: Since its establishment, our company has focused on providing high-quality entertainment video content, covering multiple fields, including travel, sports, lifestyle, etc. We are committed to providing high-quality leisure videos to users around the world, making these contents more accessible through innovative technologies and platforms. This application for DataCap is to store our leisure video content on the Filecoin network to ensure the security and long-term accessibility of the data.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: This dataset contains various types of leisure video content, covering entertainment, travel, sports, lifestyle and other fields. The video format is high-definition, compressed and processed for streaming and downloading. The data will be stored in the Filecoin network to ensure its durability, security and easy access to users around the world.
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: The data will be compressed, converted and standardized locally using tools such as FFmpeg to ensure that all videos meet storage and transmission requirements. Use the graphsplit program to create a .car file that complies with the rules,Then use the venus tool for packaging
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Asia other than Greater China, North America
Project.How will you be distributing your data t: Shipping hard drives, Venus built-in data transfer, Cloud storage (i.e. S3)
